thread.section_title: Homestay.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Homestay.com | homestay.com
thread.title: Andrea

author: Andrea
title: Andrea
text:
I had my first homestay experience last week. My stay was only for 1 night, so I did not have much opportunity to get to know the home "hosts" so if I do this again, I think a longer stay would make me feel more settled and "at home" in new surroundings. The hosts did make me feel welcome, it is just me, being unused to this situation.
I would recommend for overseas travellers but not sure if this suits everyone though (I am in my 50s) - it can feel a bit alkward and intrusive, though the hosts said not for them.
